meanings.definition: Careless or untidy in appearance or manner.
meanings.sent1: The slipshod painting had smudges and uneven lines.
meanings.sent2: She always looks slipshod with her wrinkled clothes and messy hair.
meanings.sent3: The slipshod attempt at baking cookies resulted in a burnt mess.
meanings.sent4: His slipshod work on the project left a trail of mistakes behind.
meanings.sent5: The slipshod garden was overgrown and neglected, with weeds everywhere.

meanings.definition: Done or made in a careless or hasty manner.
meanings.sent1: The slipshod repair job didn't hold for long.
meanings.sent2: He wrote a slipshod essay the night before it was due.
meanings.sent3: The slipshod wrapping of the gift made it look like a messy present.
meanings.sent4: Her slipshod attempt at fixing the leak only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The slipshod construction of the bridge led to its collapse during the storm.
